summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, July 27, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and overtime/comp time occurrences for correctional services staff. The document appears to be a routine internal staffing log.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as assigned to posts SHU #1 and SHU #2, and noted as being on sick/annual leave in change records.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as assigned to posts 10 SOUTH #1 and 10 SOUTH #2, and involved in shift relief changes.

persons.name: MELENDEZ
persons.context: Listed under 'Special Assignments' for staff search and appears in shift change records for posts MELENDEZ 1 and MELENDEZ 2.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignment
events.description: Routine daily assignment of correctional staff to various posts and shifts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a routine internal staffing document from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 27, 2019.
The document lists numerous correctional officer posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, LOBBY, UNIT) and tracks shift changes, leave (sick/annual), and overtime.
Named staff members include Thomas, M; Noel, T; and MELENDEZ, who are involved in standard post assignments and relief changes.
The document shows no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein, inmates, or case-related activities; it is purely an administrative staffing log.
